TopicTitle: Is there a benefit to the later communications parts?

Articles.Content:
The communotron 16 (which we start with) has a throughput of 0.8 which is higher than all of the other parts we unlock down the tree...

What are the advantages of the later parts?

Some would say that the later options offer superior transfer speed...

However, they do so at a significantly higher energy cost per Mit of data transferred, and the advantages in speed are pretty nominal. They don't improve the Data-to-Science conversion efficiency, either.

Considering that the frequency with which transfer speed rather than electricity consumption is my limiting factor (i.e. almost never), I've come to the point where I see no reason to use anything other than the Communotron 16. (Except for, of course, aesthetics.)
Alright, I'm glad it wasn't just me... Maybe this will be tweaked in a future version.
Parts talk moved to the part of the forum where the parts played by the game's parts are discussed.
